CraftDroidTrait.Name: Loyal
CraftDroidTrait.Description: The droid puts its creator's needs above its own, and always looks for ways to helpâ€”whether asked or not.

CraftDroidTrait.Name: Resourceful
CraftDroidTrait.Description: Some droids can adapt to problems quickly, and do not get trapped in their own overly narrow programming.

CraftDroidTrait.Name: Patient
CraftDroidTrait.Description: Unlike organic beings, droids are theoretically immortal as long as they receive proper maintenance. Thus, a droid can have a capacity for patience that even the most long-lived organic beings lack.

CraftDroidTrait.Name: Enthusiastic
CraftDroidTrait.Description: The droid has a boundless capacity to see opportunities, and it frequently points them out.

CraftDroidTrait.Name: Compassionate
CraftDroidTrait.Description: Some droids are very caring, and seek to nurture the best in those around them.

CraftDroidTrait.Name: Efficient
CraftDroidTrait.Description: The droid abhors waste, and does everything in the most timely and precise manner it can muster.

CraftDroidTrait.Name: Well-Mannered
CraftDroidTrait.Description: This droid always maintains perfect etiquette, even when dealing with individuals it does not particularly like.

CraftDroidTrait.Name: Cheerful
CraftDroidTrait.Description: A good attitude is the first step to success (or so says this droid anyway).

CraftDroidTrait.Name: Reliable
CraftDroidTrait.Description: This droid always comes through for its creator or friends.

CraftDroidTrait.Name: Cowardly
CraftDroidTrait.Description: This droid sets survival as a top priority, and shies away from any potential danger.

CraftDroidTrait.Name: Overly Literal
CraftDroidTrait.Description: Many droids (and some organic sentients) fail to grasp the nuances of language beyond its direct meaning. This is one of those droids.

CraftDroidTrait.Name: Arrogant
CraftDroidTrait.Description: Whether it believes itself to have been built better than other droids or it believes that droids are intrinsically superior to more temporary life forms, this droid has a high opinion of its own abilities.

CraftDroidTrait.Name: Impulsive
CraftDroidTrait.Description: The droid has a boundless capacity to see opportunities, and it usually acts on them without warning..

CraftDroidTrait.Name: Ruthless
CraftDroidTrait.Description: It might be spiteful, or it might just see emotion as inefficient, but this droid destroys anything that gets in its way.

CraftDroidTrait.Name: Lazy
CraftDroidTrait.Description: Droids are built to fulfill certain purposes, but this droid isn't particularly interested in doing so if it can avoid it.

CraftDroidTrait.Name: Abrasive
CraftDroidTrait.Description: Dealing with this droid is extraordinarily frustrating. Whether it answers with sarcasm or not at all, its words and actions are always barbed.

CraftDroidTrait.Name: Pessimistic
CraftDroidTrait.Description: Apparent doom lurks around every corner for this droid, and it expresses this belief at every opportunity.

CraftDroidTrait.Name: Unhinged
CraftDroidTrait.Description: The only certainty with this droid is that its decisions can't be predicted.
